entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
Hello. This is the first post on my blog. I’m going to use this as a way to help me learn new things, so I’ll probably be writing about the climate. I’m not a one trick pony however, so you might expect to see some variety here.

Don’t forget to subscribe to my feed.
